task.title: Back Up Your Cloud
task.shortdesc: This section explains what you need to back up to protect your cloud data.

context.p: We recommend that you back up the following data:

ul.li: Objects in Walrus: The frequency depends on current load. Use your own discretion to determine backup plan and strategy You must have Walrus running.
Volumes in each cluster (DAS and Overlay)
Configuration files for each Eucalyptus component (/etc/eucalyptus/eucalyptus.conf)
SAN technologies vary, so see the backup documentation for your SAN.

context.p: Users are responsible for volume backups using EBS snapshots on their defined schedules.
